[bq="EHAN"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f109306368727068f90800#post_54f109306368727068f90800
I mean how you're inferring that people wanting to fire a guy for "misogyny" will cause the end of the human race

I mean it's true but seriously, that's a _bit_ ridiculous[/bq]
If you fired every last male from every last scientific field then chances are it would end the human race cause we're talking about a metric fuckton of less people in charge of our nuclear arsenals, less people in charge of security of that, drastically less people in charge of chemical weaponry, drastically less people in charge of biological weapons, drastically less people in charge of containment for dangerous pathogens, drastically less people in charge of maintaining our energy grid, drastically less people in charge of the stock market, drastically less people in charge of our military chain of command, drastically less people in charge of our communication network, drastically less people in charge of our satellite network and so forth.

Imagine how much havoc that would wreck on the world if you were to fire every last male?

There's been cases of terrorists walking into ex-soviet union chemical weaponry storages and stealing that shit cause the sites have been completely unguarded and Russia has a shockingly and terrifying amount of enriched uranium that has been stolen.  Most of the chemical weaponry that Assad has came from Russia.  If you were to fire every last male that would be like holding out a sign going, "freebies".
